verses.text: \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*. \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* choirmaster. \w According|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Mahalath|strong="H4257"\w* \w Leannoth|strong="H6031"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* Maskil \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Ezrahite. \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* God \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* salvation, day \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w night|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w cry|strong="H6031"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* prayer come \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w You|strong="H3117"\w*; incline \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* ear \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H6817"\w*.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5186"\w* soul \w is|strong="H6440"\w* full \w of|strong="H6440"\w* troubles, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5186"\w* life draws \w near|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* Sheol.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am counted among \w those|strong="H5315"\w* descending \w to|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Pit|strong="H7585"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w like|strong="H2416"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w without|strong="H3588"\w* \w strength|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w I|strong="H1961"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* forsaken \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* dead, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* slain \w who|strong="H1397"\w* \w lie|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* grave, \w whom|strong="H1397"\w* \w You|strong="H5973"\w* remember \w no|strong="H1961"\w* \w more|strong="H1961"\w*, \w who|strong="H1397"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* cut \w off|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w Your|strong="H1961"\w* care.

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w laid|strong="H7901"\w* \w me|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* lowest Pit, \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* darkest \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* depths.
\w Your|strong="H7896"\w* wrath weighs heavily upon \w me|strong="H7896"\w*; \w all|strong="H7896"\w* \w Your|strong="H7896"\w* waves have submerged \w me|strong="H7896"\w*. Selah

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* removed \w my|strong="H3605"\w* friends \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*; \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* repulsive \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*; \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am confined \w and|strong="H3605"\w* cannot escape.

\w My|strong="H3045"\w* eyes \w grow|strong="H3318"\w* dim \w with|strong="H3318"\w* grief. \w I|strong="H3045"\w* call \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w You|strong="H3045"\w* daily, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w spread|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* hands \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w You|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w* work wonders \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dead? \w Do|strong="H3068"\w* departed spirits rise \w up|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* praise \w You|strong="H3605"\w*? Selah

\w Can|strong="H6213"\w* \w Your|strong="H6213"\w* loving devotion \w be|strong="H4191"\w* proclaimed \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* grave, \w Your|strong="H6213"\w* faithfulness \w in|strong="H6213"\w* Abaddon?

\w Will|strong="H2617"\w* \w Your|strong="H5608"\w* wonders \w be|strong="H2617"\w* known \w in|strong="H6913"\w* \w the|strong="H5608"\w* darkness, \w or|strong="H5608"\w* \w Your|strong="H5608"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H2617"\w* \w in|strong="H6913"\w* \w the|strong="H5608"\w* land \w of|strong="H6913"\w* oblivion?

But \w to|strong="H3045"\w* \w You|strong="H3045"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H3045"\w* cry \w for|strong="H3045"\w* help; \w in|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* morning \w my|strong="H3045"\w* prayer comes \w before|strong="H3045"\w* \w You|strong="H3045"\w*.

Why, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H1242"\w* reject \w me|strong="H6923"\w*? Why \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H1242"\w* hide \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* face \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6923"\w*?

\w From|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* youth \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* afflicted \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w near|strong="H6440"\w* \w death|strong="H5315"\w*. \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* borne \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* terrors; \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* despair.
\w Your|strong="H5375"\w* wrath has swept \w over|strong="H5375"\w* me; \w Your|strong="H5375"\w* terrors \w have|strong="H5375"\w* destroyed me.

\w All|strong="H5921"\w* day \w long|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* engulf \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* water; \w they|strong="H5921"\w* enclose \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* every side.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w removed|strong="H5437"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* beloved \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* friend; darkness \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* closest companion.
